results.title: Access tokens in the Microsoft identity platform - Microsoft identity platform
results.description: The contents of the token are intended only for the API, which means that access tokens must be treated as opaque strings. For validation and debugging purposes only, developers can decode JWTs using a site like jwt.ms. Tokens that a Microsoft API receives might not always be a JWT that can be decoded. It doesn't apply to tokens issued for.
